name: Lavalink Cluster
author: lavalink-server@github.com
description: Production-grade Lavalink music streaming server with multi-IP routing and anti-block

startup.done: Lavalink is ready to accept connections

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash

cd /mnt/server

# Download Lavalink
echo "Downloading Lavalink..."
curl -Lo Lavalink.jar https://github.com/lavalink-devs/Lavalink/releases/latest/download/Lavalink.jar

# Download application.yml template
if [ ! -f application.yml ]; then
    echo "Downloading default application.yml..."
    curl -Lo application.yml https://raw.githubusercontent.com/SatzzDev/lavalink-server/main/application.yml
fi

# Create plugins directory
mkdir -p plugins

echo "Installation complete!"

variables.name: Server Port
variables.description: The port that Lavalink will listen on

variables.name: Lavalink Password
variables.description: The password for connecting to this Lavalink instance

variables.name: Java Options
variables.description: JVM options for Lavalink (memory, GC, etc.)

variables.name: Spotify Client ID
variables.description: Spotify API Client ID for LavaSrc plugin

variables.name: Spotify Client Secret
variables.description: Spotify API Client Secret for LavaSrc plugin

variables.name: YouTube Refresh Token
variables.description: YouTube OAuth refresh token for anti-block

variables.name: Proxy Host
variables.description: HTTP proxy host for YouTube requests

variables.name: Proxy Port
variables.description: HTTP proxy port for YouTube requests
